name: biblys/isbn
description: A PHP library to convert and validate ISBNs & EANs

scripts.docker:test: docker run --rm --volume $PWD:/app --volume $COMPOSER_HOME:/tmp composer /bin/bash -c "composer install && composer test"
scripts.docker:update-ranges: docker run --rm --volume $PWD:/app --volume $COMPOSER_HOME:/tmp composer /bin/bash -c "composer install && composer update-ranges"
